career.name: Mortle
career.title: Software Developer
description: Designed and Developed a prototype for a death startup using Next.js, Supabase, TypeScript, SQL, and Mixpanel.
Used Mixpanel analytics to identify and resolve drop-off points, enhancing user retention

career.name: Chance Voight
career.title: Full Stack Software Developer
description: Designed and Built software for a fintech company using Javascript,HTML, CSS, Figma, Typescript, Next.js and Supabase

Worked closely with the marketing team, general manager, and CEO, utilizing Agile methodologies to drive the design, development, and maintenance of web applications, ensuring alignment, consistency, and efficient project delivery.
Implemented MixPanel to monitor user interactions such as scrolling and clicks, providing valuable insights for optimizing user experience.
